name: Little Bits (halfmexican)
description:
Made for the 2022 LinuxJam in the Godot Engine.  I have recently switched to Linux and I was learning it alongside with Godot. I made this instead of studying for my finals. I hope you enjoy!

CONTROLS

JUMP - Space

MOVE - A/D

Made with Kenney's 1-Bit Platformer Pack

https://www.google.com/search?client=firefox-b-1-d&q=+Kenneys+1-Bit+platformer+p...

Here is the GitHub Repo

https://github.com/halfmexican/LinuxGameJam
